summary: what happens when you try to kill yourself but get sucked into another universe instead
title: what happens when you try to kill yourself but get sucked into another universe instead
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EY0261

by Her11

One minute Kelly Dunce was sitting in her apartment contemplating committing suicide, the next she was lying on the floor of what looked like a laboratory staring up at a bunch of strangers. Then she finds out she’s not actually in her own dimension and on top of that superheroes exist, and she’s currently living with them. Oh, and did she forget to mention some metal armed dude keeps touching her?!

Now she has to figure out how to get home while avoiding a certain muscle-bound, incredibly hot, dark-haired, and blue-eyed super soldier with a metal arm.

Stephen: I can....why?
Peter: I have 2 exams, 3 essays, 1 project, and...
body:
Peter: Dr.dad you can bring the dead back to life, right?

Stephen: I can….why?

Peter: I have 2 exams, 3 essays, 1 project, and 5 homework assignments due next week. And once I’m done I’ll die and that’s where you’ll come in.

Stephen:……Tony help him.

summary: 500 Chances
title: 500 Chances
description:
Written for the square “Death.”

Losing Tony devastates Stephen. He casts a spell on himself, hoping to get over Tony’s death by creating alternate lifetimes in his head, in which he loses Tony in many different ways.

500 lifetimes later, Stephen finally admits that the spell isn’t working as intended.

summary: Dream Guy
title: Dream Guy
description:
Written for the square “Fantasy.”

At a party, 29-year-old Tony Stark named his dream guy. Other people at the party did, too. Then a bet was made: whoever provided photo evidence of having slept with their dream person first would win 10 million dollars.

Two decades later, Tony Stark would win that bet.

summary: “The Starks were made for the cold.” -Catelyn Stark
title: “The Starks were made for the cold.” -Catelyn Stark
body:
So…April’s gonna be on hell of a month. Game of Thrones as well as Endgame. I’ve seen just about every breakdown video suggested and as a fangirl/fanfic writer, the most randomest line can spark an idea. 

So headcanon that Loki many Earth years ago mated with a woman(or if ya wanna get more mythological, Loki could have been the mom cos ya know…shape shifting, and mated with a man.) and was an ancestor for the Stark line…Loki’s Jotunn blood in Tony is part of what helped him survive in Siberia. 

For a darker and sadder fanfic idea that I might try out later…like someone on Team Cap is spying on Tony as he’s alone in this cold climate location. Maybe it’s Scott and he’s down in ant size, reporting back. There are wolves nearby and Scott’s thinking that Tony’s wanting to go all Stark and create IronDireWolves (which would be totally cool). These are wild and dangerous animals and Tony’s there alone, his mask is lifted and his face is unreadable. Next thing he does he steps out of his armor, Scott’s confused because the wolf is now a wolf pack and getting closer. What the hell is Stark thinking? Does he have some sort of new weapon he wants to test out on wolves? Is he meeting with someone else before the wolves arrive? But no. Scott looks at Tony’s face and sees a very tired Tony and a tiredness that won’t go away after a good nap. He’s a bit too shocked for it to process it in time. The wolves step out and when did Tony get a knife? Is he gonna fight them after all? Without his armor? With a pocketknife? No…Tony’s drawing his own blood…bait.  In a weird miracle that Tony might consider a curse, the wolves don’t attack…Tony falls to his knees, relieved, ashamed, pathetic…and it’s for the first time that Scott sees Tony as broken and human as the rest of them. 

Days later, Scott breaks into Tony’s place.

Scott: Hank would be pissed…he’s not the biggest fan of your dad.

Tony: Neither am I. What does Rogers want?

Scott: I didn’t come on his orders…I came on my own. 

Tony: …for?

Scott: I…I’m taking my daughter to play lazer tag…you wanna come?

And thus is born a weird friendship(maybe ship ship??) and Tony and Peter go play lazer tag with Scott and Cassie. 

(Don’t get me started on Tony finding out about his ancestry….and then Thor and Loki finding out. Lot of feels…lot of sarcasm and sass too.So much snark.)

summary:
I’ve seen people speculate on the following photo for Avengers Endgame. 
The idea is that someone has been digitally removed to...
body:
I’ve seen people speculate on the following photo for Avengers Endgame.

The idea is that someone has been digitally removed to keep a secret. But when viewing the following gif of the same scene, I think it’s an optical illusion.

I don’t think anyone has been removed and there are only ever Nat, Steve, Bruce, and Rhodes in the scene. There looks to be even spacing between Nat and Bruce and Bruce and Rhodes; Steve leading the group out into the field. Now I do agree they are looking up at something, but that something could be coming or leaving (in Captain Marvel’s case…maybe she’s leaving to find Tony?)

Sorry if this ruins any theories. I do think there is something important about the scene, but I don’t think Marvel edited someone out. But, it is Marvel so maybe I’m wrong hahahaha.

summary: I’m rewatching Iron Man 3 and
title: I’m rewatching Iron Man 3 and
body: Tony’s anxiety attack ten minutes into the movie, at the restaurant with Rhodey? I know it’s triggered primarily by his and Rhodey’s discussion about the Mandarin and the shit from the Avengers, but I’m watching it with closed captions, and Tony says, “I broke the crayon” seconds before he staggers out of the restaurant and I just???? I’ve never noticed that before. Like, I know he’s battling PTSD (who the fuck wouldn’t, geez, it’s been a decade of badshit), but I never heard the bit about the crayon, and now that I have it’s like, I don’t know. Admittedly, I don’t have PTSD, so I can’t speak on this, but I think that was a really interesting bit. The Mandarin, the pressure to maintain the facade of calmness and happiness, the Asgardians and the Chitauri, and all the other trauma that I’m sure he’s buried away in his subconscious, it’s like it all just bubbled up until the pressure of it all gathered in his hand to break the crayon. Like, he snapped, and the crayon snapped, and he just felt so distraught at having been incapable of keeping it together, so he just left.

The Mandarin, the pressure to maintain the facade of calmness and happiness, the Asgardians and the Chitauri, and all the other trauma that I’m sure he’s buried away in his subconscious, it’s like it all just bubbled up until the pressure of it all gathered in his hand to break the crayon. Like, he snapped, and the crayon snapped, and he just felt so distraught at having been incapable of keeping it together, so he just left.

summary: Aesthetic
title: Aesthetic
body:
Your wedding to Tony Stark

Lavish, expensive, romantic, and completely breath taking. Tony would be involved in every aspect of planning the wedding. He would want to make sure it’s the biggest event of the year, an event where he could broadcast it to the whole world that gets to marry you, but most of all he would want you to anything you want. When you can’t decide what dress you want, he tells you to buy both. When you say you want candles and flowers everywhere, he delivers just that. You are his lady now, and he makes sure you know it.

Feel free to use

blog.name: incorrectavengersquotes
blog.title: Incorrect Avengers Quotes
blog.description: Submit! Ask! About!

summary: Tony: I've enjoyed today with you, Pepper, I really have. I haven't enjoyed my job in quite a long time, and it's nice to come...
body:
Tony: I've enjoyed today with you, Pepper, I really have. I haven't enjoyed my job in quite a long time, and it's nice to come into the office 20 minutes before we need to shut and hammering out a product.
Pepper: Could you, if you enjoyed it so much, maybe come in earlier tomorrow?
Tony: Pepper, I have a lot to do. This isn't all I have. Yes, this is my job. Yes, it's what I’m supposed to do. Yes, it's important for my future life that I do well, but I really have a lot of drinking—
Pepper: You also mentioned a lot about your legacy and father, and it’s very important to him, so maybe you should spend some time on it?
Tony: I'll have a think about it, Pepper. Right now, I've got an appointment down at the bar. I'll see you later.
[Later]
Tony: Just wanted to pop back in to say I'm absolutely not going to be in earlier tomorrow. Bye!

summary: No one needs to know Just little ficlet of mine. Pairing: TunderIron, Thor Odinson/Tony Stark minor(background) pairing: Pepper...
body:
No one needs to know

Just little ficlet of mine.

Pairing: TunderIron, Thor Odinson/Tony Stark

minor(background) pairing: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark; Steve Rogers/Tony Stark

Warnings: implied/ not so implied cheating

PG-13, I guess?

Disclaimer: None

Word Count: 548

Thor waited till the other Avengers had left the room. Tony hadn’t lingered, but that wasn’t necessarily new. He knew where to find him after all. Solemnly and as silent as he could, Thor went to Tony’s workshop. Without much fuss he was granted entrance, hearing the unmistakable voice of Ms. Potts.

    “Tony, you can’t keep doing this! You really should consider retir-”

    “Nuh, no can do, Pepps. They need me.”

    An audible sigh was heard followed by silence. Only the occasional clank of metal was to be heard. The Prince of Asgard decided to interrupt whatever conversation this had been.

Letting his feet touch the ground more forcefully than strictly necessary, Thor stepped closer to the engineer, until he could see the screen with miss Potts composed face on.

“Looks like you have a visitor. Hello, Thor. The discussion isn’t done, Tony. Call me tomorrow!” She said as she ended the call.

“Hey beefcake. What brings you in my humble abode?” Tony grinned, as he turned.

“You and Lady Pepper are in disagreement.” again was left out by Thor. He bent his head a tiny bit to the left and scrutinized the smaller man. A slight flinch, nervous tapping on the oil stained jeans, were sings enough to confirm it.

“What can I say, big guy, she wants me to leave the team, I can’t.”

“I’d never made you leave, Anthony.” Thor voiced his words full of conviction with a low growl like sound. He only stopped his slow stroll right in front of the seated man. The sentence alone made Tony shiver, the closeness excited him. He could feel the warmth radiating from the other, smell the slight ozonic scent surrounding Thor. Tony swallowed hard. They have been playing this dangerous game for a while now.

“I know, Thor.” He rasped. “You… ugh… we shouldn’t stand so close… I mean, what would the good Captain say?”

“No one needs to know, Tony. Not the Captain, not Jane… not Lady Pepper. Just say you want this. Want this to continue… Want us. Me.”

He leaned forward, resting his arm against Tony’s seat, bringing their faces closer together. Thor felt Tony’s breath hitch, could see his pupils dilate. Sure, Thor knew of Tony’s affair with Rogers, as did Pepper. Sometimes the other blonde joined Tony and Pepper in bed, sometimes it was just Tony and either of the others. But neither of them knew of him and Tony. They had danced around each other for a long time. They had slept a few times with each other as well. Everytime Tony told him it was the last time, everytime both knew he was lying.

“I… I don’t…“

Another sweet lie. Another denial, only to be betrayed by Tony’s trembling body and lust filled moans later.

The next morning found Tony telling Thor again: “That… was the last time, okay? Yeah… the last time…”

    He gave the same answer as everytime: “No one needs to know. But sure, Anthony.” Only to pull him back into bed and make love with him again.

Because Thor knew something Anthony wasn’t ready to admit. Thor knew, Tony may had a relationship with Pepper. Tony may had a somewhat open affair with Steve. 

But Tony’s heart was Thor’s.

Solemnly and as silent as he could, Thor went to Tony’s workshop. Without much fuss he was granted entrance, hearing the unmistakable voice of Ms. Potts.

    “Tony, you can’t keep doing this! You really should consider retir-”

    “Nuh, no can do, Pepps. They need me.”

    An audible sigh was heard followed by silence. Only the occasional clank of metal was to be heard. The Prince of Asgard decided to interrupt whatever conversation this had been.

Letting his feet touch the ground more forcefully than strictly necessary, Thor stepped closer to the engineer, until he could see the screen with miss Potts composed face on.

“Looks like you have a visitor. Hello, Thor. The discussion isn’t done, Tony. Call me tomorrow!” She said as she ended the call.

“Hey beefcake. What brings you in my humble abode?” Tony grinned, as he turned.

“You and Lady Pepper are in disagreement.” again was left out by Thor. He bent his head a tiny bit to the left and scrutinized the smaller man. A slight flinch, nervous tapping on the oil stained jeans, were sings enough to confirm it.

“What can I say, big guy, she wants me to leave the team, I can’t.”

“I’d never made you leave, Anthony.” Thor voiced his words full of conviction with a low growl like sound. He only stopped his slow stroll right in front of the seated man. The sentence alone made Tony shiver, the closeness excited him. He could feel the warmth radiating from the other, smell the slight ozonic scent surrounding Thor. Tony swallowed hard. They have been playing this dangerous game for a while now.

“I know, Thor.” He rasped. “You… ugh… we shouldn’t stand so close… I mean, what would the good Captain say?”

“No one needs to know, Tony. Not the Captain, not Jane… not Lady Pepper. Just say you want this. Want this to continue… Want us. Me.”

He leaned forward, resting his arm against Tony’s seat, bringing their faces closer together. Thor felt Tony’s breath hitch, could see his pupils dilate. Sure, Thor knew of Tony’s affair with Rogers, as did Pepper. Sometimes the other blonde joined Tony and Pepper in bed, sometimes it was just Tony and either of the others. But neither of them knew of him and Tony. They had danced around each other for a long time. They had slept a few times with each other as well. Everytime Tony told him it was the last time, everytime both knew he was lying.

“I… I don’t…“

Another sweet lie. Another denial, only to be betrayed by Tony’s trembling body and lust filled moans later.

The next morning found Tony telling Thor again: “That… was the last time, okay? Yeah… the last time…”

    He gave the same answer as everytime: “No one needs to know. But sure, Anthony.” Only to pull him back into bed and make love with him again.

Because Thor knew something Anthony wasn’t ready to admit. Thor knew, Tony may had a relationship with Pepper. Tony may had a somewhat open affair with Steve. 

But Tony’s heart was Thor’s.

summary: Irondad soulmates AU- pain
question: Irondad soulmates AU- pain
answer:
wow, that's mean, but I respect it. 

do you mean emotional or physical pain? How about both!

-He was about 7 during iron man 1 so imagine that kind of pain. He had only been with Aunt May and Uncle Ben for a year and they panicked and took him to the hospital. There was nothing physically wrong with him so the doctors decided that it was his soul connection. 

-Ever since the initial violent chest pain, he had been sick until he was about 9-10. Then everything was fine, he was constantly in very minor pain but he could handle it and he never told Ben or May. 

-Then the events of the Avengers. Peter got bruises from nowhere and would bleed a little and felt a little sad at one point. But it was during the alien invasion that it got bad. Peter watched the TV as Iron Man flew into the portal. He mistook Tony’s fear with his own and almost broke down crying. After that, he had been afraid of space and aliens. He slowly got to the point where he could watch Star Wars and it became his favorite franchise. duh. 

-During when everyone thought that Tony was dead, Peter felt brief bouts of debilitating terror and intense cold even though he was indoors and had the heat on. 

-Tony felt when Peter got bullied, he got bruises and had the breath knocked out of him on multiple occasions but never knew why. he had grown up not thinking that he had a soul connection. 

-Before Ultron, Tony felt a painful sting on the back of his neck and got violently sick for a few days after that. Only weeks later he was hit with longlasting violent sadness that reminded him of how he felt when his parents died but somehow worse. He could distinctly feel like his hands were warm and wet despite them being completely dry. 

-During and after Ultron, Peter and Tony’s combined guilt was a violent pain on its own, They both felt both the guilt of not being able to save Ben and being manipulated into making a murderbot. So that sucked. 

-Guilt felt like the only emotion that either of them could feel. Until they met during civil war. Peter’s excitement bled into Tony’s fear and they evened each other out a little. 

-Neither of them figured it out while they were around each other though. Genius who

-Peter almost accidentally killed someone when Tony found out that his parents were murdered. The rage and betrayal made him force himself out of being Spider-Man for the rest of the day because he was afraid about what would happen if he lost control. 

-Tony realized that their souls were connected when he took away Peter’s suit. He felt so strongly that he had disappointed someone important to him that he had to stop himself from tearing up. He knew, but he didn’t tell Peter. 

-Now Tony knew why on one night he felt traumatizing fear for almost ten minutes before violent pain erupted throughout his body and he felt like he was being crushed. He couldn’t breathe and he gasped for air while he tried to look on security cameras for Peter. He really regretted taking away the kids suit and Peter’s overwhelming fear bled into him and he could barely act. 

-when he could breathe again, he could still tell that Peter hadn’t gone home. He felt cold winds and like he was falling before burning heat and sharp pains as Peter was battling the vulture. 

-He gave the suit back as soon as he could 

-Between the vulture and infinity war, it wasn’t too bad. Peter still didn’t know that his soul was connected to Tony’s but he would find out soon. 

-He swore that he had a mini heart attack when Thanos wrapped his hand around the kid’s throat and not just because he could feel it 

-He could almost hear Peters pitched gasp from far away when Tony had been stabbed with his own nano-sword 

-Thanos definitely did 

-Doctor Strange did, or at least that must’ve been the reason that he saved Tony. To save the kid from the pain. 

-It didn’t do any good

-Tony felt a sudden pulse of anxiety even before people started to disappear, later he knew that it was because Peter knew. Peter’s stupid power warned him beforehand that he would be a casualty

-Tony was filled with dread that he couldn’t identify as his own or Peters as one by one, the guardians turned into dust. He could feel Peter’s molecules tear themselves apart and try to heal themselves back. 

-He felt Peter accept it, and he felt Peter fade. and he didn’t have the chance to tell him that he knew about their souls being connected, however it should’ve been obvious by then.

-Tony was terrified to figure out what he would feel when Peter was gone. It turned out that he felt very cold and very alone.

summary: Heaven Must Be Missing an Angel (Tony/Thor)
title: Heaven Must Be Missing an Angel (Tony/Thor)
body:
Whoops forgot to post this here, but I wrote this a while back as part of a TSB fill so enjoy some Angel!Thor/Human!Tony fluff!

“Well, you lasted longer than I thought you would.”

Thor blinked at his brother. Loki scoffed, leaning back to lounge across the gold embroidered couch. He swirled the wine in his glass. “Oh don’t look so surprised. Do you think you’ve been subtle sneaking away to the mortal realm? Even the mighty Odin has tightened up the pearly gates to try and stop you from heading down there.”

Loki snapped his fingers and another goblet appeared, floating in the air, nudging Thor to take it. “So, who’s the lucky human you’ve decided to break Odin’s rules for? Are we gossiping now? Do you need me to braid your hair? Are they a good kisser?”

A thundering roar filled the room as Thor’s eyes flashed with a blinding gold. “Do not trivialize my love to a schoolyard crush.”

Loki rolled his eyes. “Sneaking around behind Heimdall’s back to get to the human realm even after Odin threatened to seal you away in purgatory for a few centuries. Tell me, how does that not reek of stupidity?”

Thor grit his teeth and closed his eyes. He exhaled deeply, the image of warm brown eyes, of Tony’s soft smile as he kissed Thor good morning.

“What are you thinking about so hard?” asked Tony.

“Nothing,” said Thor, shaking his head with a smile. He stretched out under the covers and pulled Tony on top of his chest

Tony frowned. He leaned forward and poked Thor’s forehead. “This doesn’t look like nothing. You’re starting to get worry lines. I thought angels weren’t supposed to get wrinkles.”

Read the rest on ao3

Do you think you’ve been subtle sneaking away to the mortal realm? Even the mighty Odin has tightened up the pearly gates to try and stop you from heading down there.”

Loki snapped his fingers and another goblet appeared, floating in the air, nudging Thor to take it. “So, who’s the lucky human you’ve decided to break Odin’s rules for? Are we gossiping now? Do you need me to braid your hair? Are they a good kisser?”

A thundering roar filled the room as Thor’s eyes flashed with a blinding gold. “Do not trivialize my love to a schoolyard crush.”

Loki rolled his eyes. “Sneaking around behind Heimdall’s back to get to the human realm even after Odin threatened to seal you away in purgatory for a few centuries. Tell me, how does that not reek of stupidity?”

Thor grit his teeth and closed his eyes. He exhaled deeply, the image of warm brown eyes, of Tony’s soft smile as he kissed Thor good morning.

“What are you thinking about so hard?” asked Tony.

“Nothing,” said Thor, shaking his head with a smile. He stretched out under the covers and pulled Tony on top of his chest

Tony frowned. He leaned forward and poked Thor’s forehead. “This doesn’t look like nothing. You’re starting to get worry lines. I thought angels weren’t supposed to get wrinkles.”
